name: mongoose-template
description: template for backend web server using express and mongoose

scripts.db:load:all: npm run db:load:users && npm run db:load:bikes && npm run db:load:sales
scripts.db:load-users-heroku: mongoimport -h ds163781.mlab.com:63781 -d heroku_j45qh1g9 -c users -u heroku_j45qh1g9 -p n12pc0m9tp345ao3af2jblbt2c --jsonArray --drop --file ./lib/seed-data/users-data.json
scripts.db:load-bikes-heroku: mongoimport -h ds163781.mlab.com:63781 -d heroku_j45qh1g9 -c bikes -u heroku_j45qh1g9 -p n12pc0m9tp345ao3af2jblbt2c --jsonArray --drop --file ./lib/seed-data/bikes-data.json
scripts.db:load-sales-heroku: mongoimport -h ds163781.mlab.com:63781 -d heroku_j45qh1g9 -c sales -u heroku_j45qh1g9 -p n12pc0m9tp345ao3af2jblbt2c --jsonArray --drop --file ./lib/seed-data/sales-data.json
scripts.db:load-all-heroku: npm run db:load-users-heroku && npm run db:load-bikes-heroku && npm run db:load-sales-heroku

author: Injoong Yoon <injoongyoon@gmail.com>
